adDetails: ARE YOU MOVING?-WELL YOU CAME TO THE RIGHT-POSTING.-(WE ARE A FATHER AND SON-MOVING-SERVICE-PROVIDER IN SONOMA-COUNTY.)-WE HAVE BEEN HELPING PEOPLE OUT MOVING IN SONOMA-COUNTY FOR WELL OVER 12-YEARS AND COUNTING.-WE ARE EXPERIENCED,STRONG,CAREFUL,-AND NO EVERY-ASPECT OF HOW TO MOVE YOU IN A PROFESSIONAL,SAFE,-MANNER.-WE ARE ORGANIZED,AND DETAILED IN EVERYTHING WE DO. -WE HAVE GOOD-DISTILLED-WORK-ETHICS,-THAT WE APPLY TO EVERYTHING WE DO.-WE LOAD AND UNLOAD,-HOMES,APARTMENTS,CONDO'S,TOWN-HOMES,STUDIOS,ETC.-WE ALSO LOAD AND UNLOAD STORAGE-LOCKERS,RENTAL-TRUCKS,PODS,U-PACKS,TRAILERS,ETC.-WE DO THE WORK LOAD FOR YOU,-SO YOU DON'T HAVE TOO,-IT'S THAT SIMPLE!-IF YOU WANT -EXPERIENCED-HELP-THAT NO WHAT THERE DOING,-THEN GIVE US A CALL FOR A PRICE-QUOTE,-OR QUESTIONS YOU MAY HAVE.-WE DO THIS KIND OF WORK EVERYDAY,-DAY-IN AND DAY-OUT,-365-DAYS A YEAR.-WE GET YOU FROM-A-TO-B,-WITHOUT THE HASSLE AND HEADACHES, THAT CAN HAPPEN ON YOUR MOVING-DAY.-WE-GET-IT-DONE-THE-RIGHT-WAY.-THANKS,KEVIN AND PATRICK.- PLEASE CALL show contact info.-THANKS,- AND ASK FOR KEVIN.
